author: erans
msg: Added temporary constant "INDEX_OFFSET" to keep track of where changes are
needed for converting from 1-based to 0-based indexing.

author: sf
msg: Add ap_varbuf API for resizable buffers.
Increase length limit of lines in the configuration file to 16MB.
Increase length limit of lines in the group file to 16MB.
Windows and Netware build changes are untested.

author: mcucchiara
msg: dynamic attributes became again a map of String (see http://s.apache.org/dyn)

author: erans
msg: Changed loop condition to avoid additional test.
